# startStream

Start sending data on a stream.

## Declaration

```swift
virtual IOReturn startStream(
 void); 
```

## Return Value

Returns kIOReturnSuccess if the stream was successfully started.

## Overview

This must be implemented by a subclass.

## Stream control

- **getStreamMode**: Returns the mode of the stream, either input or output.
- **setStreamMode**: Sets the mode of the stream, either input or output.
- **stopStream**: Stop sending data on a stream.
- **suspendStream**: Temporarily suspend data flow on the stream.
